oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1947-04-22 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of All Star Western Theatre radio program from April 22, 1947. Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Cottonseed Clark, and guest Jimmy Wakely.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage; Jimmy Wakely
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Radio play 'The Lone Bandit' (Jimmy Wakely, cast) [continued from part 1] -- Cottonseed Clark announces the cast -- Cottonseed Clark introduces Foy Willing and Jimmy Wakely -- Foy Willing and Jimmy Wakely talk -- A Melody From The Sky (Jimmy Wakely) -- Drifting Along, Singing A Song (instrumental) -- Cottonseed Clark introduces Foy Willing -- Foy Willing talks -- I Wonder Who's Kissing Her Now (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Closing statement (Foy Willing) -- Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Closing statement (Cottonseed Clark)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: All star western theatre (Radio program); Clark, Cottonseed; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Forte, Joe, 1893-1967; Wakely, Jimmy, 1914-1982; Murphy, Horace, 1880-1975
